creator: siffemoz

content:
Looks like you got help here https://support.mozilla.org/en-US/questions/1467330 and that was your only other post in this forum.

christ1 said
Try to rebuild the index file of the troubled folder. Right-click the folder - Properties - Repair Folder

Although I would have expressed it as right click the folder, select the properties and then the repair button.

The answer has not changed and is the same simple solution that fixes it for most folk and there have been hundreds posting exactly the same issue here of late, despite there being loads of search results recommending re-indexing offered before they post.
creator: MattAuSupport

content: See if it appears in the console - ctrl-shift-j (or maybe cmd vs ctrl).
creator: siffemoz

content:
Prova con queste operazioni di manutenzione:

  1. Fare un backup integrale del profilo -> https://support.mozilla.org/it/kb/profili-thunderbird#w_effettuare-una-copia-di-sicurezza-del-profilo
  2. Compattare le cartelle -> https://support.mozilla.org/it/kb/compattazione-cartelle
  3. Riavviare Thunderbird
  4. Se il problema non è risolto, ricostruire l'indice globale -> https://support.mozilla.org/it/kb/ricostruzione-indice-globale
  5. Riavviare Thunderbird
  6. Se il problema non si è ancora risolto: click destro sulla cartella che contiene la mail illeggibile -> Proprietà -> [Ripara la cartella]
creator: @next
